channel.title: Devo 7.8 xD not finished
channel.description:
Devolution v7.8
About the server - i have been working testing to do something new - i have tryed to make a dodian rebuild
Did i acomplish this No i didnt :p but server still 100% works u just need to fix some bugs
Features important things. Drop logs Trade logs chat logs ban logs private chat logs mute logs command logs invalid names ip's connections Reports
Features. Ancient Teleports Yanille Taverly seers dragons Catherby fishing guild legends guild Gnome agility
Full NPC'S same as dodian Full drops like dodian Working Gnome agility Full working doors same as dodian Full working membership (with number of days left)
Skills Thieving 87% cooking 80% fishing 84% firemaking 97% woodcutting 98% farming 0% mining 60% runecrafting 40% smithing 70% crafting 60% fletching 97% agility 50%
Added skill tab menu's
game option tab in dodian there was
switch magic yes no
and it's the same in devolution v7.8 download link:http://uppit.com/v/1pceg8f6 or :http://www.megaupload.com/?d=4IMIPI3B
